analysis.description:
Reentrancy in Airdrop.claimTokensByMerkleProof (/unique_chucks/8/0x75bff18af1e5eb4420913d9aa52aee78178e6aa7.sol#460-476):
	External calls:
	- require(bool,string)(token.transfer(msg.sender,_amount),AIRDROP_TRANSFER_FAILURE) (/unique_chucks/8/0x75bff18af1e5eb4420913d9aa52aee78178e6aa7.sol#473)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- completedAirdrops (/unique_chucks/8/0x75bff18af1e5eb4420913d9aa52aee78178e6aa7.sol#474-475)

Owned.withdrawTokens (/unique_chucks/8/0x75bff18af1e5eb4420913d9aa52aee78178e6aa7.sol#121-133) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(_contractOwner,balance) (/unique_chucks/8/0x75bff18af1e5eb4420913d9aa52aee78178e6aa7.sol#132)

Airdrop.version should be constant (/unique_chucks/8/0x75bff18af1e5eb4420913d9aa52aee78178e6aa7.sol#415-416)
ERC20Interface.symbol should be constant (/unique_chucks/8/0x75bff18af1e5eb4420913d9aa52aee78178e6aa7.sol#19-21)

Different versions of Solidity is used in /unique_chucks/8/0x75bff18af1e5eb4420913d9aa52aee78178e6aa7.sol:
	- Version used: ['^0.4.23', '^0.4.24']
	- /unique_chucks/8/0x75bff18af1e5eb4420913d9aa52aee78178e6aa7.sol#1 declares pragma solidity^0.4.24
	- /unique_chucks/8/0x75bff18af1e5eb4420913d9aa52aee78178e6aa7.sol#10-13 declares pragma solidity^0.4.23
	- /unique_chucks/8/0x75bff18af1e5eb4420913d9aa52aee78178e6aa7.sol#42 declares pragma solidity^0.4.23
	- /unique_chucks/8/0x75bff18af1e5eb4420913d9aa52aee78178e6aa7.sol declares pragma solidity^0.4.24
